title: Suzano to Keep Its Pulp Output Below Capacity on Weaker Dollar
description: Brazil’s Suzano SA, one of the world’s top exporters of pulp, plans to keep production below full capacity through 2026 as a weakening US dollar hurts revenue, Chief Executive Officer Joao Alberto Abreu said.
content: Brazil’s Suzano SA, one of the world’s top exporters of pulp, plans to keep production below full capacity through 2026 as a weakening US dollar hurts revenue, Chief Executive Officer Joao Alberto Abreu said.
